--[[

FaB Deck Builder
Created by David Owens @ Owens Satisfactory Cards (satifsactorycards.com).

Currently, there are two ways to import a deck:
  1. JSON output from FaB DB
  2. JSON output from thepitchzone.com (thanks @Ever)

These follow the format defined here: https://gist.github.com/owensd/af086ac73d2b3692558ed804865fa319

--]]

dev_mode_enabled = false

deck_builder_input = nil
spawning_deck = false
last_selected_sealed = ""

--[[
  Utility function to split strings into tokens.
  Source: http://lua-users.org/wiki/SplitJoin
]]
function string:split(sep)
   local sep, fields = sep or ":", {}
   local pattern = string.format("([^%s]+)", sep)
   self:gsub(pattern, function(c) fields[#fields+1] = c end)
   return fields
end

function onLoad()
  math.randomseed(os.time())

  -- Hide the invocation list cards from the users.
  for _, obj_id in pairs(invocation_list) do
    local obj = getObjectFromGUID(obj_id)
    local pos = obj.getPosition()
    if dev_mode_enabled then
      pos.y = 1
      obj.interactable = true
    else
      pos.y = -4
      obj.interactable = false
    end

    obj.setPosition(pos)
  end
end

function onDeckInputChanged(player, value, id)
  deck_builder_input = value:trim()
end

function onLoadDeckFromFABDBPressed()
  if deck_builder_input == nil or deck_builder_input == '' then
  elseif string.find(deck_builder_input, "fabrary.net") then
    fabrary_getDeckFromURL()
  else
    fabdb_createDeckFromAPI(deck_builder_input)
  end
end

function onLoadDeckFromGenericURLPressed()
  if deck_builder_input == nil or deck_builder_input == '' then
  elseif string.find(deck_builder_input, "thepitchzone.com") then
    onLoadDeckFromTPZPressed()
  elseif string.find(deck_builder_input, "fabrary.net") then
    fabrary_getDeckFromURL()
  elseif string.find(deck_builder_input, "http") then
    osc_getDeckFromURL(deck_builder_input)
  end
end

function onLoadDeckFromTPZPressed()
  if deck_builder_input == nil or deck_builder_input == '' then
  else
    -- Keep raw URL support as some folks are using the TPZ button for raw URL importing.
    if string.find(deck_builder_input, "http") and not string.find(deck_builder_input, "thepitchzone.com") then
      osc_getDeckFromURL(deck_builder_input)
    else
      -- https://thepitchzone.com/deck/d3I0MTk5Nw
      local parts = string.split(deck_builder_input, "/")
      local slug_id = parts[#parts]
      if slug_id != nil then
        osc_getDeckFromURL('https://thepitchzone.com/osctts/' .. slug_id)
      end
    end
  end
end

function fabrary_getDeckFromURL()
  if spawning_deck then
    return
  end

  local headers = {
    ["x-api-key"] = "tts-osc-vpnycGhvzfyjyRdvzQ8VPescPgfqAX",
    Accept = "application/json",
  }

  -- https://fabrary.net/decks/01G76G1DP5VVB050BT3YV9TQ7K
  local parts = string.split(deck_builder_input, "/")
  local slug_id = parts[#parts]

  local url = ""
  if slug_id != nil then
    url = 'https://5zvy977nw7.execute-api.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/prod/decks/' .. slug_id
  else
    print("Unable to determine the deck ID")
    return
  end

  spawning_deck = true
  WebRequest.custom(url, "GET", true, " ", headers, osc_loadDeckV2)
end

function onLoadSingleCardPressed()

  local fns = {
    ["H"] = function(card_id, num) spawnHero(card_id, num) end,
    ["W"] = function(card_id, num) spawnWeapon(card_id, num) end,
    ["E"] = function(card_id, num) spawnEquipment(card_id, num) end,
    ["M"] = function(card_id, num) spawnDeck(card_id, num) end,
    ["S"] = function(card_id, num) spawnSideboard(card_id, num) end
  }

  if deck_builder_input == nil or deck_builder_input == '' then
  else
    -- Multiple cards can be added at once using the format:
    --  <card_id>[:slot_id][:num]
    -- ex:
    --  MON001,MON002:W:2,MON003:E,MON004:M:3,MON005:S,MON006
    local cards = string.split(deck_builder_input, ",")
    for _, t in pairs(cards) do
      local parts = string.split(t, ":")
      local card_id = parts[1]
      local slot_id = (parts[2] or "H"):upper()
      local num = parts[3] or 1

      for n = 1, num do
        if fns[slot_id] == nil then
          spawnHero(card_id, num)
        else
          fns[slot_id](card_id, num)
        end
      end
    end
  end
end

function onGenerateSetSelected(player, option, id)
  local info = deck_list[option]
  if info then
    if info.deck_id then
      fabdb_createDeckFromAPI(info.deck_id)
    else
      local card_ids = {}

      -- The deck can be formed of deck IDs or info to generate all of the IDs.
      if info.first then

        for card_id, _ in pairs(card_images) do
          if card_id:find(info.prefix, 1, true) == 1 then
            table.insert(card_ids, card_id)
          end
        end
        -- for n=info.first, info.last do
        --   local card_id = info.prefix .. string.format("%03d", n)
        --   table.insert(card_ids, card_id)
        -- end
      elseif info.card_ids then
        card_ids = info.card_ids
      end

      local count = 0
      for _, v in pairs(card_ids) do
        spawnHero(v, count)
        count = count + 1
      end
    end
  end
end

function loadCardObjectFromGameAssets(identifier, position, rotation, back_face_url)
  -- With the Uprising set, there are cards that need to be spawned from objects, so handle that here.
  local obj_id = invocation_list[identifier]
  if obj_id != nil then
    obj_id = invocation_list[identifier]
    card_obj = getObjectFromGUID(obj_id)
    new_card = card_obj.clone()
    new_card.setPosition(position)
    new_card.setRotation(rotation)
    new_card.setLock(false)

    return new_card
  end

  return nil
end

function retrieveCardFromFabDBAPI(identifier, position, rotation, back_face_url)
  -- Card info is normally found in the locally cached data - however, for cases where that data is not known, this function
  -- can be used to lookup the card from FabDB.

  local headers = {
    ["Content-Type"] = "application/json",
    Accept = "application/json",
  }
  local url = "https://api.fabdb.net/cards/" .. card_id
  WebRequest.get(url, function(request)
    if request.is_error then
      log(request.error)
    else
      log(request.text)
      local data = JSON.decode(request.text)

      local new_card = spawnObject({
        type = "Card",
        position = position,
        rotation = rotation,
        scale = { x = 1.5, y = 1.0, z = 1.5 },
        callback_function = function(spawned_card)
          -- set the front and back url
        end
      })

      local is_sideways = false
      for _, keyword in pairs(data["keywords"]) do
        if keyword == "landmark" then
          is_sideways = true
        end
      end

      -- Custom overrides for particular card images
      image_url = data["image"]:split("?")[1]
      if card_id == "ELE000" then
        image_url = "http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/1684898660861024963/80840508762EB0CAC1281D3304A06975EB09032F/"
      end

      card_params = {
        face = image_url,
        back = back_face_url,
        sideways = is_sideways
      }
      new_card.setCustomObject(card_params)
      new_card.setName(identifier .. " - " .. data["name"])
      new_card.setDescription(data["text"])
      new_card.reload()
    end
  end)
end

function spawnCard(identifier, position, rotation, back_face_url)
  -- Cards are dynamically created instead of cloned. This offers greater flexibility and less instances on the table.

  -- Some cards have special objects created on the game table; those cards should be loaded from there.
  local new_card = loadCardObjectFromGameAssets(identifier, position, rotation, back_face_url)
  if new_card != nil then
    return new_card
  end

  if back_face_url == nil then
    back_face_url = "https://fabdb2.imgix.net/cards/backs/card-back-1.png"
  end

  card_id = identifier:upper()

  -- If the card is not in the images list, then it needs to be retrieved from fabdb.
  card_image_info = card_images[card_id]
  if card_image_info == nil then
    retrieveCardFromFabDBAPI(card_id, position, rotation, back_face_url)
    return
  end

  card_info = card_db[card_id]
  if card_info == nil then
    card_id = string.gsub(card_id, "-MV", "")
    card_info = card_db[card_id]
  end

  card_name = card_info.name
  card_text = card_info.text

  base_card_info = nil
  if card_info.base_card != nil then
    base_card_info = card_db[card_info.base_card]
    card_name = base_card_info.name
    card_text = base_card_info.text
  end

  local new_card = spawnObject({
    type = "Card",
    position = position,
    rotation = rotation,
    scale = { x = 1.5, y = 1.0, z = 1.5 },
    callback_function = function(spawned_card)
      -- set the front and back url
    end
  })

  local is_sideways = false
  if card_info.sideways == true then
    is_sideways = true
  end

  card_params = {
    face = card_image_info['url'],
    back = back_face_url,
    sideways = is_sideways
  }
  new_card.setCustomObject(card_params)
  new_card.setName(identifier .. " - " .. card_name)
  new_card.setDescription(card_text)
  new_card.reload()

  return new_card
end

SPAWN_BASELINE_LEFT = -5.55
SPAWN_BASELINE_ZOFF = (5.55 - 1.85)
SPAWN_BASELINE_XOFF = -0.25
SPAWN_HEIGHT = 1.25
CARD_HEIGHT_OFFSET = 0.2

function cardPosition_GenericCard(card_number)
  local pos = self.getPosition()
  local position = { x=pos.x + SPAWN_BASELINE_XOFF, y=pos.y + SPAWN_HEIGHT + (card_number * CARD_HEIGHT_OFFSET), z=pos.z + SPAWN_BASELINE_LEFT + (SPAWN_BASELINE_ZOFF * 0) }
  local rotation = { x=0, y=90, z=180 }
  return {
    ["position"] = position,
    ["rotation"] = rotation
  }
end

function cardPosition_HeroCard(card_number)
  local pos = self.getPosition()
  local position = { x=pos.x + SPAWN_BASELINE_XOFF, y=pos.y + SPAWN_HEIGHT + (card_number * CARD_HEIGHT_OFFSET), z=pos.z + SPAWN_BASELINE_LEFT + (SPAWN_BASELINE_ZOFF * 0) }
  local rotation = { x=0, y=90, z=180 }
  return {
    ["position"] = position,
    ["rotation"] = rotation
  }
end

function cardPosition_WeaponCard(card_number)
  local pos = self.getPosition()
  local position = { x=pos.x + SPAWN_BASELINE_XOFF, y=pos.y + SPAWN_HEIGHT + (card_number * CARD_HEIGHT_OFFSET), z=pos.z + SPAWN_BASELINE_LEFT + (SPAWN_BASELINE_ZOFF * 1) }
  local rotation = { x=0, y=90, z=180 }
  return {
    ["position"] = position,
    ["rotation"] = rotation
  }
end

function cardPosition_EquipmentCard(card_number)
  local pos = self.getPosition()
  local position = { x=pos.x + SPAWN_BASELINE_XOFF, y=pos.y + SPAWN_HEIGHT + (card_number * CARD_HEIGHT_OFFSET), z=pos.z + SPAWN_BASELINE_LEFT + (SPAWN_BASELINE_ZOFF * 2) }
  local rotation = { x=0, y=90, z=180 }
  return {
    ["position"] = position,
    ["rotation"] = rotation
  }
end

function cardPosition_DeckCard(card_number)
  local pos = self.getPosition()
  local position = { x=pos.x + SPAWN_BASELINE_XOFF, y=pos.y + SPAWN_HEIGHT + (card_number * CARD_HEIGHT_OFFSET), z=pos.z + SPAWN_BASELINE_LEFT + (SPAWN_BASELINE_ZOFF * 3) }
  local rotation = { x=0, y=90, z=180 }
  return {
    ["position"] = position,
    ["rotation"] = rotation
  }
end

function cardPosition_SideboardCard(card_number)
  local pos = self.getPosition()
  local position = { x=pos.x + SPAWN_BASELINE_XOFF, y=pos.y + SPAWN_HEIGHT + (card_number * CARD_HEIGHT_OFFSET), z=pos.z + SPAWN_BASELINE_LEFT + (SPAWN_BASELINE_ZOFF * 4) }
  local rotation = { x=0, y=90, z=180 }
  return {
    ["position"] = position,
    ["rotation"] = rotation
  }
end

function cardPosition_ExtraCard(card_number)
  local pos = self.getPosition()
  local position = { x=pos.x + SPAWN_BASELINE_XOFF, y=pos.y + SPAWN_HEIGHT + (card_number * CARD_HEIGHT_OFFSET), z=pos.z + SPAWN_BASELINE_LEFT + (SPAWN_BASELINE_ZOFF * 5) }
  local rotation = { x=0, y=90, z=180 }
  return {
    ["position"] = position,
    ["rotation"] = rotation
  }
end

function spawnPack(pack, pos, back_face_url)
  -- Spawn each of the cards, offsetting them to ensure the ordering can be maintained.
  for n, card_id in pairs(pack) do
    if pos == "H" then
      spawnPackCard(card_id, n, back_face_url)
    elseif pos == "W" then
      spawnWeapon(card_id, n, back_face_url)
    elseif pos == "E" then
      spawnEquipment(card_id, n, back_face_url)
    elseif pos == "M" then
      spawnDeck(card_id, n, back_face_url)
    elseif pos == "S" then
      spawnSideboard(card_id, n, back_face_url)
    elseif pos == "X" then
      spawnExtra(card_id, n, back_face_url)
    end
  end
end

function spawnPackCard(card, card_number, back_face_url)
  local pos = cardPosition_GenericCard(card_number)
  return spawnCard(card, pos.position, pos.rotation, back_face_url)
end

function spawnHero(card, card_number, back_face_url)
  local pos = cardPosition_HeroCard(card_number)
  return spawnCard(card, pos.position, pos.rotation, back_face_url)
end

function spawnWeapon(card, card_number, back_face_url)
  local pos = cardPosition_WeaponCard(card_number)
  return spawnCard(card, pos.position, pos.rotation, back_face_url)
end

function spawnEquipment(card, card_number, back_face_url)
  local pos = cardPosition_EquipmentCard(card_number)
  return spawnCard(card, pos.position, pos.rotation, back_face_url)
end

function spawnDeck(card, card_number, back_face_url)
  local pos = cardPosition_DeckCard(card_number)
  return spawnCard(card, pos.position, pos.rotation, back_face_url)
end

function spawnSideboard(card, card_number, back_face_url)
  local pos = cardPosition_SideboardCard(card_number)
  return spawnCard(card, pos.position, pos.rotation, back_face_url)
end

function spawnExtra(card, card_number, back_face_url)
  local pos = cardPosition_ExtraCard(card_number)
  return spawnCard(card, pos.position, pos.rotation, back_face_url)
end

function sanitizeJSON(text)
  -- Handle the unicode apostophes...
  local result = string.gsub(text, "‘", "'")
  result = string.gsub(result, "’", "'")
  result = string.gsub(result, "\\u2018", "'")
  return result
end

function createSimulatedPack(set_id, class_name1, class_name2, class_name3, class_name4, pos)
  --[[
    Pack Breakdown:
    - 4 commons
    - 1 equipment
    - 1 rare
    - 1 rare, super rare, or majestic
    - 1 foil (common -> fabled)
    - 7 class commons (alternating)
    - 1 token (two to simulate it being double sided)
  ]]

  local fab_set = set_list[set_id]

  local pack = {}

  -- commons (4)
  local commons = fab_set["commons"]
  for _ = 1,4 do
    local card_id = commons[math.random(#commons)]
    table.insert(pack, card_id)
  end

  -- equipment (1)
  local equipment = fab_set["equipment"]
  local card_id = equipment[math.random(#equipment)]
  table.insert(pack, card_id)

  -- rare (1)
  local rares = fab_set["rares"]
  local card_id = rares[math.random(#rares)]
  table.insert(pack, card_id)

  -- rare, super, or majestic (1)
  local prob = math.random(100)
  if prob > 85 then
    local majestics = fab_set["majestics"]
    local card_id = majestics[math.random(#majestics)]
    table.insert(pack, card_id)
  elseif prob > 65 then
    local supers = fab_set["supers"]
    local card_id = supers[math.random(#supers)]
    table.insert(pack, card_id)
  else
    local card_id = rares[math.random(#rares)]
    table.insert(pack, card_id)
  end

  -- foil slot (1)
  local prob = math.random(100)
  if prob == 100 then
    local fabled = fab_set["fabled"]
    local card_id = fabled[math.random(#fabled)]
    table.insert(pack, card_id)
  elseif prob > 90 then
    local legendary = fab_set["legendary"]
    local card_id = legendary[math.random(#legendary)]
    table.insert(pack, card_id)
  elseif prob > 85 then
    local majestics = fab_set["majestics"]
    local card_id = majestics[math.random(#majestics)]
    table.insert(pack, card_id)
  elseif prob > 65 then
    local supers = fab_set["supers"]
    local card_id = supers[math.random(#supers)]
    table.insert(pack, card_id)
  elseif prob > 50 then
    local card_id = rares[math.random(#rares)]
    table.insert(pack, card_id)
  elseif prob > 40 then
    local commons = fab_set["class_commons"][class_name1]
    local card_id = commons[math.random(#commons)]
    table.insert(pack, card_id)
  elseif prob > 30 then
    local commons = fab_set["class_commons"][class_name2]
    local card_id = commons[math.random(#commons)]
    table.insert(pack, card_id)
  elseif prob > 20 then
    local commons = fab_set["class_commons"][class_name3]
    local card_id = commons[math.random(#commons)]
    table.insert(pack, card_id)
  elseif prob > 10 then
    local commons = fab_set["class_commons"][class_name4]
    local card_id = commons[math.random(#commons)]
    table.insert(pack, card_id)
  else
    local card_id = commons[math.random(#commons)]
    table.insert(pack, card_id)
  end

  -- class commons
  for _ = 1,7 do
    local class = math.random(4)
    local class_name = class_name4
    if class == 1 then
      class_name = class_name1
    elseif class == 2 then
      class_name = class_name2
    elseif class == 3 then
      class_name = class_name3
    end

    local commons = fab_set["class_commons"][class_name]
    local card_id = commons[math.random(#commons)]
    table.insert(pack, card_id)
  end

  -- tokens! create two to simulate front/back.
  local tokens = fab_set["tokens"]
  table.insert(pack, tokens[math.random(#tokens)])
  table.insert(pack, tokens[math.random(#tokens)])

  spawnPack(pack, pos)
end

function onCreateSimulatedPackButtonPressed_WTR(id, pos)
  createSimulatedPack(id, "brute", "guardian", "ninja", "warrior", pos)
end

function onCreateSimulatedPackButtonPressed_ARC(id, pos)
  createSimulatedPack(id, "mech", "ranger", "runeblade", "wizard", pos)
end

function onCreateSimulatedPackButtonPressed_CRU(id, pos)
  --[[
    Pack structure:
     - 7 Commons
     - 1 Rare
     - 1 Rare / Majestic / Legendary
     - 1 Premium Foil
  ]]

  local set_id = id or "CRU"
  local fab_set = set_list[set_id]

  local pack = {}

  -- commons (7)
  local commons = fab_set["commons"]
  for _ = 1,7 do
    local card_id = commons[math.random(#commons)]
    table.insert(pack, card_id)
  end

  -- rare (1)
  local rares = fab_set["rares"]
  local card_id = rares[math.random(#rares)]
  table.insert(pack, card_id)

  -- rare, super, or majestic (1)
  local prob = math.random(100)
  if prob > 90 then
    local legendary = fab_set["legendary"]
    local card_id = legendary[math.random(#legendary)]
    table.insert(pack, card_id)
  elseif prob > 75 then
    local majestics = fab_set["majestics"]
    local card_id = majestics[math.random(#majestics)]
    table.insert(pack, card_id)
  else
    local card_id = rares[math.random(#rares)]
    table.insert(pack, card_id)
  end

  -- foil slot (1)
  local prob = math.random(100)
  if prob == 100 then
    local fabled = fab_set["fabled"]
    local card_id = fabled[math.random(#fabled)]
    table.insert(pack, card_id)
  elseif prob > 90 then
    local legendary = fab_set["legendary"]
    local card_id = legendary[math.random(#legendary)]
    table.insert(pack, card_id)
  elseif prob > 75 then
    local majestics = fab_set["majestics"]
    local card_id = majestics[math.random(#majestics)]
    table.insert(pack, card_id)
  elseif prob > 50 then
    local card_id = rares[math.random(#rares)]
    table.insert(pack, card_id)
  else
    local card_id = commons[math.random(#commons)]
    table.insert(pack, card_id)
  end

  spawnPack(pack, pos)
end

function onCreateSimulatedPackButtonPressed_MON(id, pos)
  --[[
    Pack Structure:
     - 6 class commons
     - 5 generic commons
     - 1 foil
     - 1 equipment
     - 1 rare
     - 1 rare/majestic/legendary
     - 1 token
  ]]

  local set_id = id or "MON"
  local fab_set = set_list[set_id]

  local pack = {}

  -- class commons (6)
  for _ = 1,6 do
    local class_commons = fab_set["class_commons"]
    local card_id = class_commons[math.random(#class_commons)]
    table.insert(pack, card_id)
  end

  -- generic commons (5)
  for _ = 1,5 do
    local commons = fab_set["commons"]
    local card_id = commons[math.random(#commons)]
    table.insert(pack, card_id)
  end

  -- foil slot (1)
  local prob = math.random(100)
  if prob == 100 then
    local fabled = fab_set["fabled"]
    local card_id = fabled[math.random(#fabled)]
    table.insert(pack, card_id)
  elseif prob > 90 then
    local legendary = fab_set["legendary"]
    local card_id = legendary[math.random(#legendary)]
    table.insert(pack, card_id)
  elseif prob > 75 then
    local majestics = fab_set["majestics"]
    local card_id = majestics[math.random(#majestics)]
    table.insert(pack, card_id)
  elseif prob > 50 then
    local rares = fab_set["rares"]
    local card_id = rares[math.random(#rares)]
    table.insert(pack, card_id)
  elseif prob > 20 then
    local class_commons = fab_set["class_commons"]
    local card_id = class_commons[math.random(#class_commons)]
    table.insert(pack, card_id)
  else
    local commons = fab_set["commons"]
    local card_id = commons[math.random(#commons)]
    table.insert(pack, card_id)
  end

  -- rare (1)
  local rares = fab_set["rares"]
  local card_id = rares[math.random(#rares)]
  table.insert(pack, card_id)

  -- rare, majestic, or legendary (1)
  local prob = math.random(100)
  if prob > 90 then
    local legendary = fab_set["legendary"]
    local card_id = legendary[math.random(#legendary)]
    table.insert(pack, card_id)
  elseif prob > 75 then
    local majestics = fab_set["majestics"]
    local card_id = majestics[math.random(#majestics)]
    table.insert(pack, card_id)
  else
    local card_id = rares[math.random(#rares)]
    table.insert(pack, card_id)
  end

  -- equipment (1)
  local equipment = fab_set["equipment"]
  local card_id = equipment[math.random(#equipment)]
  table.insert(pack, card_id)

  -- tokens! create two to simulate front/back.
  local tokens = fab_set["tokens"]
  table.insert(pack, tokens[math.random(#tokens)])
  table.insert(pack, tokens[math.random(#tokens)])

  spawnPack(pack, pos)
end

function onCreateSimulatedPackButtonPressed_ELE(id, pos)
  --[[
    Pack Structure:
     - 4 elemental commons
     - 1 random common
     - 1 rare
     - 1 rare/majestic
     - 1 foil
     - 1 equipment
     - 6 class commons:
       - guardian
       - runeblade
       - ranger
       - guardian
       - runeblade
       - ranger
     - 1 token
  ]]

  local set_id = id or "ELE"
  local fab_set = set_list[set_id]

  local pack = {}

  -- elemental commons (4)
  for _ = 1,4 do
    local commons = fab_set["elemental_commons"]
    local card_id = commons[math.random(#commons)]
    table.insert(pack, card_id)
  end

  -- any common (1)
  for _ = 1,1 do
    local commons = fab_set["commons"]
    local card_id = commons[math.random(#commons)]
    table.insert(pack, card_id)
  end

  -- rare (1)
  local rares = fab_set["rares"]
  local card_id = rares[math.random(#rares)]
  table.insert(pack, card_id)

  -- rare+, non-foil (1)
  local prob = math.random(100)
  if prob > 80 then
    local majestics = fab_set["majestics"]
    local card_id = majestics[math.random(#majestics)]
    table.insert(pack, card_id)
  else
    local card_id = rares[math.random(#rares)]
    table.insert(pack, card_id)
  end

  -- foil slot (1)
  local prob = math.random(100)
  if prob == 100 then
    local fabled = fab_set["fabled"]
    local card_id = fabled[math.random(#fabled)]
    table.insert(pack, card_id)
  elseif prob > 95 then
    local legendary = fab_set["legendary"]
    local card_id = legendary[math.random(#legendary)]
    table.insert(pack, card_id)
  elseif prob > 80 then
    local majestics = fab_set["majestics"]  -- includes equipment and items
    local card_id = majestics[math.random(#majestics)]
    table.insert(pack, card_id)
  elseif prob > 50 then
    local rares = fab_set["rares"]
    local card_id = rares[math.random(#rares)]
    table.insert(pack, card_id)
  elseif prob > 40 then
    local class_commons = fab_set["class_commons"]["guardian"]
    local card_id = class_commons[math.random(#class_commons)]
    table.insert(pack, card_id)
  elseif prob > 30 then
    local class_commons = fab_set["class_commons"]["runeblade"]
    local card_id = class_commons[math.random(#class_commons)]
    table.insert(pack, card_id)
  elseif prob > 20 then
    local class_commons = fab_set["class_commons"]["ranger"]
    local card_id = class_commons[math.random(#class_commons)]
    table.insert(pack, card_id)
  else
    local commons = fab_set["commons"]
    local card_id = commons[math.random(#commons)]
    table.insert(pack, card_id)
  end

  -- equipment (1)
  local equipment = fab_set["equipment"]
  local card_id = equipment[math.random(#equipment)]
  table.insert(pack, card_id)

  -- class commons (6): guardian, runeblade, ranger (x2)
  for _ = 1,2 do
    local class_commons = fab_set["class_commons"]["guardian"]
    local card_id = class_commons[math.random(#class_commons)]
    table.insert(pack, card_id)
    local class_commons = fab_set["class_commons"]["runeblade"]
    local card_id = class_commons[math.random(#class_commons)]
    table.insert(pack, card_id)
    local class_commons = fab_set["class_commons"]["ranger"]
    local card_id = class_commons[math.random(#class_commons)]
    table.insert(pack, card_id)
  end

  -- tokens! create two to simulate front/back.
  local tokens = fab_set["tokens"]
  table.insert(pack, tokens[math.random(#tokens)])
  table.insert(pack, tokens[math.random(#tokens)])

  spawnPack(pack, pos)
end

function onCreateSimulatedPackButtonPressed_UPR(id, pos)
  --[[
      -- HonestlySarcastc — Today at 2:21 PM
      -- Here you go @owensd - tag me or PM me if you have any additional questions. Tried to break it down as best as possible.
      --
      -- 3 - common generic, ice, and / or draconic (never 3 of the same kind, max 2)
      -- 1 - common equipment
      -- 1 - rare
      -- 1 - rare or better
      -- 1 - rainbow foil
      -- 2 draconic ninja commons (only draconic ninja because no ninja commons)
      -- 2 draconic illusionist commons (only draconic illusionist because no illusionist commons)
      -- 2 iyslander playable commons (this can be Ice, Wizard, Ice Wizard, or Elemental Wizard... think i listed them all)
      -- 1 extra common (this might be before the other 6 cards)
      -- 2 tokens (a CF would take up a token slot and are useable in sealed, but not draft)
  ]]

  local set_id = id or "UPR"
  local fab_set = set_list[set_id]

  local pack = {}

  -- 3 - common generic, ice, and / or draconic (never 3 of the same kind, max 2)
  for _ = 1,3 do
    local prob = math.random(100)
    if prob < 34 then
      local cards = fab_set["common"]["generic"]
      local card_id = cards[math.random(#cards)]
      table.insert(pack, card_id)
    elseif prob < 68 then
      local cards = fab_set["common"]["ice"]
      local card_id = cards[math.random(#cards)]
      table.insert(pack, card_id)
    else
      local cards = fab_set["common"]["draconic"]
      local card_id = cards[math.random(#cards)]
      table.insert(pack, card_id)
    end
  end

  -- 1 - common equipment
  for _ = 1,1 do
    local cards = fab_set["equipment"]["common"]
    local card_id = cards[math.random(#cards)]
    table.insert(pack, card_id)
  end

  -- 1 - rare
  for _ = 1,1 do
    local cards = fab_set["rare"]
    local card_id = cards[math.random(#cards)]
    table.insert(pack, card_id)
  end

  -- 1 - rare or better
  local prob = math.random(100)
  if prob > 80 then
    local cards = fab_set["majestic"]
    local card_id = cards[math.random(#cards)]
    table.insert(pack, card_id)
  else
    local cards = fab_set["rare"]
    local card_id = cards[math.random(#cards)]
    table.insert(pack, card_id)
  end

  -- 1 - rainbow foil
  local prob = math.random(100)
  if prob < 60 then
    local cards = fab_set["rainbow_foil"]["common"]
    local card_id = cards[math.random(#cards)]
    table.insert(pack, card_id)
  elseif prob < 90 then
    local cards = fab_set["rainbow_foil"]["rare"]
    local card_id = cards[math.random(#cards)]
    table.insert(pack, card_id)
  else
    local cards = fab_set["rainbow_foil"]["majestic"]
    local card_id = cards[math.random(#cards)]
    table.insert(pack, card_id)
  end

  -- 2 draconic ninja commons (only draconic ninja because no ninja commons)
  for _ = 1,2 do
    local cards = fab_set["common"]["draconic_ninja"]
    local card_id = cards[math.random(#cards)]
    table.insert(pack, card_id)
  end

  -- 2 draconic illusionist commons (only draconic illusionist because no illusionist commons)
  for _ = 1,2 do
    local cards = fab_set["common"]["draconic_illusionist"]
    local card_id = cards[math.random(#cards)]
    table.insert(pack, card_id)
  end

  -- 2 iyslander playable commons (this can be Ice, Wizard, Ice Wizard, or Elemental Wizard... think i listed them all)
  for _ = 1,2 do
    local prob = math.random(3)
    if prob == 1 then
      local cards = fab_set["common"]["ice_wizard"]
      local card_id = cards[math.random(#cards)]
      table.insert(pack, card_id)
    elseif prob == 2 then
      local cards = fab_set["common"]["elemental_wizard"]
      local card_id = cards[math.random(#cards)]
      table.insert(pack, card_id)
    else
      local cards = fab_set["common"]["wizard"]
      local card_id = cards[math.random(#cards)]
      table.insert(pack, card_id)
    end
  end

  -- 1 extra common (this might be before the other 6 cards)
  for _ = 1,1 do
    local clookup = {
      [1] = "generic",
      [2] = "ice",
      [3] = "draconic",
      [4] = "draconic_ninja",
      [5] = "draconic_illusionist",
      [6] = "elemental_wizard",
      [7] = "ice_wizard",
      [8] = "wizard",
    }
    local cidx = math.random(#clookup)

    local cards = fab_set["common"][clookup[cidx]]
    local card_id = cards[math.random(#cards)]
    table.insert(pack, card_id)
  end

  -- 2 tokens (a CF would take up a token slot and are useable in sealed, but not draft)
  for _ = 1,2 do
    local prob = math.random(24)
    if prob == 6 then
      local cards = fab_set["cold_foil"]
      local card_id = cards[math.random(#cards)]
      table.insert(pack, card_id)
    else
      local cards = fab_set["token"]
      local card_id = cards[math.random(#cards)]
      table.insert(pack, card_id)
    end
  end

  spawnPack(pack, pos)
end

function onGenerateSimulatedSealed(player, option, id)
  last_selected_sealed = option

  local card_positions = {"H", "W", "E", "M", "S", "X"}
  for _, p in pairs(card_positions) do
    if option == "Welcome to Rathe" then
      onCreateSimulatedPackButtonPressed_WTR("WTR", p)
    elseif option == "Arcane Rising" then
      onCreateSimulatedPackButtonPressed_ARC("ARC", p)
    elseif option == "Crucible of War" then
      onCreateSimulatedPackButtonPressed_CRU("CRU", p)
    elseif option == "Monarch" then
      onCreateSimulatedPackButtonPressed_MON("MON", p)
    elseif option == "Tales of Aria" then
      onCreateSimulatedPackButtonPressed_ELE("ELE", p)
    elseif option == "Uprising" then
      onCreateSimulatedPackButtonPressed_UPR("UPR", p)
    elseif option == "Dynasty" then
      onCreateSimulatedPackButtonPressed_UPR("DYN", p)
    end
  end
end

function onGenerateSimulatedSealedAgain()
  onGenerateSimulatedSealed(nil, last_selected_sealed, nil)
end


--[[

Standard Deck Loading Methods for OSC format.

]]--

function osc_getDeckFromURL(deck_url)
  if spawning_deck then
    return
  end
  spawning_deck = true
  WebRequest.get(deck_url, osc_loadDeck)
end

function osc_loadDeck(resp)
  local json = sanitizeJSON(resp.text)
  if type(json) != "string" or json:sub(1, 1) != "{" then
    broadcastToAll("Unable to retrieve data from URL: " .. deck_builder_input)
    spawning_deck = false
    return
  end

  local deck = JSON.decode(json)
  if deck == nil then
    broadcastToAll("Deck JSON format invalid.")
    spawning_deck = false
    return
  end
  if deck.weapons == nil and deck.equipment == nil and deck.maindeck == nil then
    broadcastToAll("Deck does not have cards.")
    spawning_deck = false
    return
  end

  local n_heroes = 1
  local n_weapons = 1
  local n_equipment = 1
  local n_deck = 1
  local n_sideboard = 1

  local back_face_url = nil --deck.cardBack

  spawnHero(deck.hero_id, n_heroes, back_face_url)
  n_heroes = n_heroes + 1
  for _, card in pairs(deck.weapons) do
    local num_to_spawn = card.count or 1
    for _ = 1, num_to_spawn do
      spawnWeapon(card.id, n_weapons, back_face_url)
      n_weapons = n_weapons + 1
    end
  end
  for _, card in pairs(deck.equipment) do
    local num_to_spawn = card.count or 1
    for _ = 1, num_to_spawn do
      spawnEquipment(card.id, n_equipment, back_face_url)
      n_equipment = n_equipment + 1
    end
  end
  for _, card in pairs(deck.maindeck) do
    local num_to_spawn = card.count or 1
    for _ = 1,num_to_spawn do
      spawnDeck(card.id, n_deck, back_face_url)
      n_deck = n_deck + 1
    end
  end
  for _, card in pairs(deck.sideboard) do
    local num_to_spawn = card.count or 1
    for _ = 1,num_to_spawn do
      spawnSideboard(card.id, n_sideboard, back_face_url)
      n_sideboard = n_sideboard + 1
    end
  end

  spawning_deck = false
end

--[[
  Loads cards from V2 of the deck format.
]]
function osc_loadDeckV2(resp)
  local json = sanitizeJSON(resp.text)
  if type(json) != "string" or json:sub(1, 1) != "{" then
    broadcastToAll("Unable to retrieve data from URL: " .. deck_builder_input)
    log(resp)
    spawning_deck = false
    return
  end

  local deck = JSON.decode(json)
  if deck == nil then
    broadcastToAll("Deck JSON format invalid.")
    spawning_deck = false
    return
  end
  if deck.cards == nil then
    broadcastToAll("Deck does not have cards.")
    spawning_deck = false
    return
  end

  local n_heroes = 1
  local n_weapons = 1
  local n_equipment = 1
  local n_deck = 1
  local n_sideboard = 1

  local back_face_url = deck.cardBack

  for _, card in pairs(deck.cards) do
    local num_to_spawn = card.total
    local num_to_spawn_to_sideboard = card.sideboardTotal

    if card.type == "weapon" then
      for _ = 1, num_to_spawn do
        spawnWeapon(card.cardIdentifier, n_weapons, back_face_url)
        n_weapons = n_weapons + 1
      end
      for _ = 1,num_to_spawn_to_sideboard do
        spawnSideboard(card.cardIdentifier, n_sideboard, back_face_url)
        n_sideboard = n_sideboard + 1
      end

    elseif card.type == "hero" then
      spawnHero(card.cardIdentifier, n_heroes, back_face_url)
      n_heroes = n_heroes + 1
    elseif card.type == "equipment" then
      for _ = 1, num_to_spawn do
        spawnEquipment(card.cardIdentifier, n_equipment, back_face_url)
        n_equipment = n_equipment + 1
      end
      for _ = 1,num_to_spawn_to_sideboard do
        spawnSideboard(card.cardIdentifier, n_sideboard, back_face_url)
        n_sideboard = n_sideboard + 1
      end
    else
      for _ = 1, num_to_spawn do
        spawnDeck(card.cardIdentifier, n_deck, back_face_url)
        n_deck = n_deck + 1
      end
      for _ = 1,num_to_spawn_to_sideboard do
        spawnSideboard(card.cardIdentifier, n_sideboard, back_face_url)
        n_sideboard = n_sideboard + 1
      end
    end
  end

  spawning_deck = false
end

--[[

FaB DB Parsing Methods.

]]--

function fabdb_packRetrieved(resp)
  local json = sanitizeJSON(resp.text)
  local info = JSON.decode(json)
  if info == nil then
    broadcastToAll("Unable to load pack for set.")
    return
  end

  -- First, find out if there are any duplicate cards. Doing this means the temporary deck does not need to be created multiple times.
  local cards = {}

  for _, card in pairs(info) do
    if cards[card.identifier] == nil then
      cards[card.identifier] = 1
    else
      cards[card.identifier] = cards[card.identifier] + 1
    end
  end

  local count = 0
  local base_deck = nil
  -- Spawn the cards!
  for key, num in pairs(cards) do
    spawnPackCard(key, num, count)
    count = count + 1
  end
end

function fabdb_deckRetrieved(resp)
  local json = sanitizeJSON(resp.text)
  if type(json) != "string" or json:sub(1, 1) != "{" then
    broadcastToAll("Unable to retrieve deck from: " .. deck_builder_input)
    spawning_deck = false
    return
  end

  local info = JSON.decode(json)
  if info == nil then
    broadcastToAll("Unable to load deck from ID.")
    spawning_deck = false
    return
  end
  if info.cards == nil then
    broadcastToAll("JSON does not have a cards collection.")
    spawning_deck = false
    return
  end

  local n_heroes = 1
  local n_weapons = 1
  local n_equipment = 1
  local n_deck = 1
  local n_sideboard = 1

  -- fabdb has _all_ cards the cards in `info.cards`. This table stores the `card.identifier` and the number of
  -- instances contained in the sideboard.
  local in_sideboard = {}

  -- Load up the sideboard.
  for _, card in pairs(info.sideboard) do
    in_sideboard[card.identifier] = card.total

    for _ = 1,card.total do
      spawnSideboard(card.identifier, n_sideboard)
      n_sideboard = n_sideboard + 1
    end
  end

  -- Spawn the cards!
  for _, card in pairs(info.cards) do
    local num_in_sideboard = in_sideboard[card.identifier]
    if num_in_sideboard == nil then
      num_in_sideboard = 0
    end
    local num_to_spawn = card.total - num_in_sideboard

    for _ = 1,num_to_spawn do
      if table.contains(card.keywords, "hero") then
        spawnHero(card.identifier, n_heroes)
        n_heroes = n_heroes + 1
      elseif table.contains(card.keywords, "weapon") then
        spawnWeapon(card.identifier, n_weapons)
        n_weapons = n_weapons + 1
      elseif table.contains(card.keywords, "equipment") then
        spawnEquipment(card.identifier, n_equipment)
        n_equipment = n_equipment + 1
      else
        spawnDeck(card.identifier, n_deck)
        n_deck = n_deck + 1
      end
    end
  end



  spawning_deck = false
end

function fabdb_createDeckFromAPI(deck_url_or_id)
  if spawning_deck then
    return
  end

  if deck_url_or_id == nil then
    return
  end

  -- Support the full URL or just the deck ID
  deck_url_or_id = deck_url_or_id:trim()
  if deck_url_or_id == "" then
    return
  end

  local deck_id = ""
  local s_index = string.find(deck_url_or_id, "/[^/]*$")
  if s_index == nil then
    deck_id = deck_url_or_id
  else
    deck_id = deck_url_or_id:sub(s_index + 1)
  end

  local fabdb_url = "https://api.fabdb.net/decks/" .. deck_id .. "/osc"
  osc_getDeckFromURL(fabdb_url)
end


--[[
  Table helpers.
]]
function table.contains(table, element)
  for _, value in pairs(table) do
    if value == element then
      return true
    end
  end
  return false
end

--[[
  String helpers.
]]

function string.trim(s)
  -- source: http://lua-users.org/wiki/StringTrim
  local from = s:match"^%s*()"
  return from > #s and "" or s:match(".*%S", from)
end

--[[
  A lookup table for each of the card images. These are used to generate cards on-demand. This is done for a number of
  reasons:
    1. Managing the card images is a pain within TTS, so having these externally managed is much easier.
    2. These are hosted from the official card images, so any changes or updates will get picked up after clearing
       the cache.
    3. Spoiler season means that new cards can simply roll out automatically.
    4. This makes the deck builder portable to any mod that wants to use it to import decks.

  This makes use of FAB DB's card image service, so it is subject to change.
]]

deck_list = {
  -- The printed sets.
  ["Welcome to Rathe"] = { first = 0, last = 225, prefix = "WTR" },
  ["Welcome to Rathe (Unlimited)"] = { first = 0, last = 225, prefix = "U-WTR" },

  ["Everfest"] = { first = 0, last = 197, prefix = "EVR" },

-- This is the map of card ID's to the image URL. This is done to stop relying on FABDB's images.
card_images = {


  ["1HP001"] = { url = 'http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/1849304444447552319/4D2B9406EF96D2745510DB2E731CDFC89D6DF5DB/' },
